name: Mech Skeleton
description: Mech Skeleton is an HTC Vive game mixing intense first person shooter action with hide and seek stealth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 11 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
